name: Rico – A Tale Of Two Brothers
name_original: Rico – A Tale Of Two Brothers
description:
Rico – A Tale Of Two Brothers is a retro-inspired platformer for iPhone, iPad, Android, Windows, Mac and Linux that mixes elements from many great classics like Super Mario, Castlevania or Metroid with my own humble ideas.
Bottom line: I wanted to create a game I would have loved to play as a child and still love to play now!

Rico features 32 levels spread over 4 worlds of retro awesomeness! :)
